job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The R&D team researches, iterates, experiments, prototypes and builds tools and services that power the ViX streaming platform. The team handles complex challenges and works on innovative and often AI focused projects while controlling and directing other engineering teams, external partners and stakeholders. The role is essential in providing our audience a great experience every time they open the VIX app and will be key to developing industry-leading reliability, quality, and performance.

   In this role, as part of the R&D team, you will work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development. Your core role will be to research, prototype and develop software. You will work on all aspects of software development including front-end, back-end, database management, and other integrations.

   ABOUT YOU:

   You dive headfirst into challenges and have a problem-solving mentality. You are comfortable with failing often and fast on the road towards a solution. You evangelize software craftsmanship and operational excellence yet pragmatic to know when to incur technical debt versus 'doing it right'. This is a fine balance in an R&D team. You are confident yet humble enough to change your mind when new information presents itself. You value open communication and are willing to give and receive feedback. You are a self-starter, flexible and can adjust to shifting priorities.

   YOUR DAY-DAY: (aka Responsibilities) The team you will be a part of will;
     * Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
     * Research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.
     * Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
     * Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Engineer, R&D

The R&D team researches, iterates, experiments, prototypes and builds tools and services that power the ViX streaming platform. The team handles complex challenges and works on innovative and often AI focused projects while controlling and directing other engineering teams, external partners and stakeholders. The role is essential in providing our audience a great experience every time they open the VIX app and will be key to developing industry-leading reliability, quality, and performance.

   In this role, as part of the R&D team, you will work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development. Your core role will be to research, prototype and develop software. You will work on all aspects of software development including front-end, back-end, database management, and other integrations.

   ABOUT YOU:

   You dive headfirst into challenges and have a problem-solving mentality. You are comfortable with failing often and fast on the road towards a solution. You evangelize software craftsmanship and operational excellence yet pragmatic to know when to incur technical debt versus 'doing it right'. This is a fine balance in an R&D team. You are confident yet humble enough to change your mind when new information presents itself. You value open communication and are willing to give and receive feedback. You are a self-starter, flexible and can adjust to shifting priorities.

   YOUR DAY-DAY: (aka Responsibilities) The team you will be a part of will;
     * Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
     * Research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.
     * Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
     * Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description mentions AI/ML and LLMs but lacks specific details on model development, fine-tuning, or deployment. The emphasis is on R&D, prototyping, and general software development across the stack, rather than specializing in a particular AI engineering profile. It leans towards using AI as a component within broader R&D efforts rather than being a dedicated AI/ML or GenAI Engineer role.

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development.'
job_tasks.phrase: understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.' This implies working with or developing models, even if details are scarce.
job_tasks.phrase: AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'all aspects of software development including front-end, back-end, database management, and other integrations.' and 'prototypes and build tools and services that power the ViX streaming platform.'
job_tasks.phrase: work on all aspects of software development including front-end, back-end, database management, and other integrations.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'prototypes and build tools and services that power the ViX streaming platform.'
job_tasks.phrase: prototypes and build tools and services that power the ViX streaming platform.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'controlling and directing other engineering teams, external partners and stakeholders' and 'consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users', which suggests a need for operational considerations in deployment.
job_tasks.phrase: consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users
